Course_Title: Professional Photography: Studio Technique and Photocomposition
Program_Policies: Some courses may require prerequisites.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).
